title: Presidential Campaign Logos Reach New Level Of Sophistication
teaser: From water bottles and bumper stickers, to fundraising emails and Twitter accounts, the logos of the 2016 presidential candidates will soon be plastered across the country.
contentencoded:
From water bottles and bumper stickers, to fundraising emails and Twitter accounts, the logos of the 2016 presidential candidates will soon be plastered across the country. Graphic designer Armin Vit tells NPR about the designs so far.

Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
